categories: Category:Star Wars Episode II: Attack of the Clones voice actors
Category:Star Wars Episode III: Revenge of the Sith voice actors

nodes.text: Marton Csokas (born June 30, 1966, New Zealand) voiced Poggle the Lesser in Star Wars: Episode II Attack of the Clones and Star Wars: Episode III Revenge of the Sith. Marton also played Celeborn in Peter Jackson's The Lord of the Rings trilogy and appeared in a few more famous Hollywood movies like xXx, The Bourne Supremacy, Kingdom of Heaven, The Equalizer and The Amazing Spider-Man 2.
